sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Leaders around the world share their Christmas messages, focusing on ongoing wars across the globe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: More than 100 people have died at a refugee camp in Gaza as Israeli President Benjamin Netanyahu vows to up the army's assault.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Students and other citizens have blocked key roads in Belgrade as protests against the current elected government continue.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Russian prisoner Alexei Navalny has been located in the Arctic nearly three weeks after his team lost contact with him.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In his Christmas message, Pope Francis deplored the, quote, desperate humanitarian situation in Gaza,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: called for hostages release and an end to the war in the Palestinian enclave.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: From St. Peter's Basilica balcony, he sent messages of support, especially to the Christian communities in Gaza and elsewhere.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: support, especially to the Christian communities in Gaza and elsewhere. In Bethlehem, Mass was celebrated this Monday morning at the Church of the Nativity, built on the site where Christians believed Jesus Christ was born.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Christian pilgrims were unable to attend, as is tradition, since access to the city is restricted due to the war between Israel and Hamas Germany's president Frank Walter Steinmeier in his Christmas message recalled the horror caused by the atrocities committed by Hamas in Israel and Gaza and the victims of the war in the Middle East.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Ukraine started a new tradition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In order to move away from Russia and closer to Europe, Christmas is now celebrated on the 25th of December.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: At a monastery in Kiev, Ukrainians gathered to pray.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This year, Christmas Eve Mass was celebrated in Ukrainian.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Israeli strikes on Monday battered the Gaza Strip.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The local health ministry run by Hamas said 250 Palestinians were killed and 500 wounded in the past 24 hours alone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In the Maghazi refugee camp, rescue workers pulled dozens more bodies from the wreckage hours after a strike levelled a three-storey building and shattered others nearby.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu visited the Gaza Strip on Monday and vowed to step up the army's assault.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: His party said, ''It's going to be a long war that's not close to ending,'' Netanyahu announced.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The IDF released footage showing what it says are soldiers raiding a weapons manufacturing plant and concrete factory used by Hamas to build tunnels in the Khan Younis area in south Gaza before destroying it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Netanyahu vowed to bring Israeli captives home but said, quote, more time was needed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: He was booed by families of the hostages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Several hundred university students and other citizens in Serbia have blocked traffic at key streets in Belgrade, braving a police warning. No incidents have been reported so far after a tense night where hundreds of demonstrators tried to break into the city council and clash with police.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: There was a lot of irregularities through whole Serbia, so this is the first action and after that if we don't have answer from ministry we will go in the new blockade in next days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: President Aleksandar Vucic has met with the Russian ambassador to Serbia, who he thanked for providing them information on the opposition's protests.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Serbian police said on Monday they had detained nearly 40 people who took part in a violent protest against what election observers said were widespread irregularities during a recent general ballot.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Imprisoned Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny has been located at a prison colony above the Arctic Circle, nearly three weeks after contact with him was lost.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Navalny's team says he was moved to a penal colony in the Yamalo-Nanets region and that he is, quote, doing well.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: His spokesperson announced that Navalny's lawyer had visited him earlier on Monday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Navalny, the most prominent foe of Russian President Vladimir Putin, is serving a 19-year sentence on charges of extremism.
